original_text: He must tell the people that they must wash the clothes. The people must keep these clothes separate from their other clothes for seven more days.
korean_text: 제사장은 명령하여 그 색점 있는 것을 빨게 하고 또 이레 동안 간직하였다가

sentences.original_text: that they must wash the clothes
The people must keep these clothes separate
sentences.korean_translation: 백성은 이 옷들을 따로 보관해야 합니다
